entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
